body.name: Desk Chairs with Wheels and Arms Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair with 300LBS Capacity (Black-1Unit)
features: 【All Day Comfort and Focus】This home office chair allows you focus on your work without worrying about aches and pains. Adjustable armrests , approx 3.1’’ thick seat cushion which is soft and elastic enough for long day working, the mesh backrest can perfectly improve the breathability so that you can even enjoy the comfort in hot seasons.

【Ergonomic Office Chair】GYI M902 ergonomic mesh office chair will easily take the shape of your back when you sit and maintain the natural curves in your spine. This ergonomic support helps you maintain a good posture. It also reduces back pain for people that work for long hours seated.

【Adjustable Mesh Office Chair】A good chair often means one that comes with a variety of adjustments. GYI's desk chair with wheels fits this bill. It's surprisingly easy to assemble in minutes. You can push the armrest up and down; the seat height can be adjusted within 17.3’’-21.3’’; it’s also a 360°swivel office chair , the smooth casters make it convenient to move to anywhere in your workplace.

【Affordable Desk Chairs with Wheels】If you are looking for an affordable mesh chair with adjustable seat height, then the GYI M902 is one of your best options. The chair's design makes it comfortable and strong. Its lumbar support helps prevent lower back pain when you sit for extended hours.

【Guaranteed After Sales】The high quality bearing base allows max capacity of 300lbs. GYI will provide you with the best service, if you have any questions with this desk office chair, please feel free to contact us via Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional comfort and stylish chair
reviews.reviewText: I must say it exceeded my expectations on multiple fronts. This chair offers a remarkable blend of comfort, durability, and contemporary design that truly enhances any workspace.The chair is exceptionally sturdy and built to last. The robust frame and solid construction inspire confidence in its durability. The smooth-rolling casters and 360-degree swivel mechanism provide effortless mobility, allowing you to move around your workspace with ease.Aesthetically, Its sleek and modern design effortlessly complements any office or home environment. The combination of black and chrome accents gives it a sophisticated look, making it a tasteful addition to any workspace decor.Assembly was a breeze, thanks to the clear and concise instructions provided. I appreciated the attention to detail, as every component was thoughtfully packaged, ensuring a hassle-free setup.In terms of value, this chair is worth every penny. While it might be priced slightly higher than some alternatives, its superior comfort, durability, and stylish design make it a worthwhile investment in your long-term comfort and productivity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable even cats approved it
reviews.reviewText: It’s simple to install. Very durable. Size is good, you have enough room to put a comfy pillow also enough room for cat to hide behind the back. Worth the price of paying. Love it! My cats low key enjoy it. Haven’t see them scratch it at all. Means they rather sit on it than scratch it. Easy to clean and vacuum. Very stable. Love the chair so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid desk chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair is a solid, relatively cheap option for a desk chair. It is quite comfortable, easy to build, and looks as advertised. However, I will say that I wish it had a bit more give in terms of its flexibility to lean back. Additionally, the armrests are a bit too high for my liking, and they are not adjustable. Overall, this is a solid option for a desk chair, and good value for what you pay. With that said, if you are looking to invest in a chair for the longterm, I would suggest looking at chairs in a higher price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair came ingood time and was easy to assemble. The parts were easy to locate and use. It is very comfortable and I like the size. ir is roomy which makes it more comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top-Notch Comfort and Durability!
reviews.reviewText: Its ergonomic design and 300LBS capacity ensure unparalleled comfort and durability. Easy assembly, smooth-rolling wheels, and sleek design make it a solid five-star choice for a stylish and reliable office chair. A must-have for any workspace!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice chair, not all parts to put together are included
reviews.reviewText: The chair is really nice and the back has good support. The chair was fairly easy to put together but when it got to attaching the wheels to the chair. We were four screws short and when messaging the company they said it would be 4 weeks before they could get us the screws... and that was them putting a rush on them! we got the chair within two or three days! Poor customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and elegant
reviews.reviewText: i was looking for a white home office chair and this one is perfect for me. I like the aesthetic of it. The chair is easy to install and they have a strong chair frame, and handles are adjustable. The chair cushion is not too thin and not too thick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not comfortable, Hurst to sit in.
reviews.reviewText: The chair looked comfortable and from the reviews it sounded like a great office chair.I am in so much pain, my bottom and back. The chair is tilting to the front right side.I don't know what to do. I am in tears. I thought that this was supposed to be a good work chair for long periods of time. I get up for breaks every hour. Then I like to get back to work. I just got this chair this week. I am supposed to love it. However, I don't. I don't know if returning it would be worth it. Or some kind of seating support. It thought that the chair had a tilting lock to help adjust my body. No luck.The back of the chair is not made for people who have a full size bottom, there is no space to sit comfortably. I am a very active person and keep on the move. But when it is time for me to sit to make my money for my home I can't be uncomfortable...Signed frustrated and uncomfortable.
